name: RT Easy Builder – Advanced addons for Elementor
author: risetheme

sections.description:
RT Easy Builder is a bunch of Advanced Extra Addons for the Popular Plugin Elementor including a demo importer that would help to import any Readymade Starter sites with one click. Extra add ons cover all the essentials elements for creating perfect websites using Elementor Page Builder. A collection of 10+ premade stater templates will help you build your websites in one click import like Business, Charity, Education, Corporate, Magazine, Constructions, App Landing, News, Photography, Travel, etc.

RT Easy Builder is using this plugin ‘One Click Demo Import’ for importing readymade templates created with our extra widgets. For demo data, we’re using our service that is hosted on our server ( risethemes.com ).

One Click Demo Import

Magnify your Elementor page building experience with our extra bunch of widgets. Also, it helps to import any starter sites to your website with a single click.

Check our Starter Demos

Why RT Easy Builder – Advanced Addons for Elementor?

Import pre-made templates and elementor that come with Essential Addons and design your website to create a unique layout.
Install Recommended Themes to get the premade blocks and templates

Essential Widgets

Our library consists of a wide range of essential widgets to create beautiful layouts for your website.

Elegant Starter Templates

Provides an elegant starter template that’s easy to set up and are responsive. You will get visually appealing designs for all the devices.

Quick and Friendly Support

In case of an issue, rely on clearly written documentation, videos, or contact us. We will be happy to solve your issues in the quickest time possible.

No coding knowledge required

With RT Easy Builder, you are capable of creating elegant designs even if you don’t have any coding skills. All you need to be is creative.

Regular Updates

We are keen to deliver regular updates to ensure that the addons work perfectly with latest versions of elementor and wordpress.

Customizable Everything Easily

To make your website simple and flexible, you can easily customize our theme settings and an extra bunch of add ons that support Elementor.

Easy to Import pre-define templates

RT Easy Builder comes with a demo importer that helps to import starter designs, components, etc with just a single click.

Flexible and Easy options

With flexible & Powerful control options in the widgets, you can create your customized landing page with just drag and drop options.

Expert Support

Always, we believe in customer satisfaction. If you need any quick support, feel free to contact us. We’re mostly available via email and Skype.
Support

Elementor page builder is required for this plugin.

EXTRA WIDGETS & PRE-DEFINE TEMPLATES

We have created multiple useful widgets to boost your Elementor Page and import options

  1. Featured Slider – Create an awesome CTA section either above-the-fold area or in any other place as per your need.

  2. Blog Listing – Display the blog listings either by category or all posts in an elegant layout. Just drag and drop the widget at your desired place.

  3. Profile Card – hare your energetic team members. You can add their photo, name, designation, description and social profiles.

  4. Counter – Display the important data attractively. You just need to be creative as it has endless layout possibilities.

  5. Post Thumbnail – Coming – Post with thumbnail is a extra add on for Elementor. This block will fetch few blog articles either all posts or by category and show it in a grid format. You can easily drag and drop the widget.

  6. Pricing Table – Coming– Present your price list in an appealing way. It’s just a drag and drop with configuring few options.

Check out Pre Define Templates

Resources

slick:
Author: Ken Wheeler
Source: http://github.com/kenwheeler/slick
License: Licensed MIT

One Click Demo Import:
Author: OCDI
Source: https://wordpress.org/plugins/one-click-demo-import/
License: GPL3
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html
sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.
1. Upload the rt-easy-builder folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory or alternatively upload the rt-easy-builder.x.x.x.zip file via the plugin page of WordPress by clicking ‘Add New’ and selecting the zip from your computer.
2. Activate the RT Easy Builder WordPress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
4. Use RT Easy Builder on your next page or post.
sections.faq:
I have activated the plugin. Where is the “Import Demo Data” page?

You will find the import page in wp-admin -> Appearance -> Import Demo Data.

Where are the demo import files and the log files saved?

The files used in the demo import will be saved to the default WordPress uploads directory. An example of that directory would be: ../wp-content/uploads/2016/03/.
The log file will also be registered in the wp-admin -> Media section, so you can access it easily.

sections.reviews:
Seamless flexibility and effortless importing with one-click settings available

By Eagle Vision IT (eaglethemes) on July 31, 2023

Discover a set of advanced extra add-ons crafted for the renowned Elementor plugin. Enjoy the convenience of a demo importer, allowing users to import readymade starter sites with a single click.

short_description: The Essential Widget Library for Elementor.
